alert.note: Alert for Taylor (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 08 at 12:09AM CDT until May 08 at 12:45AM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 AM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN JONES AND NORTHEASTERN TAYLOR COUNTIES... At 1205 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Stith, or near Tye, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Abilene around 1230 AM CDT. Tye and Dyess Afb around 1220 AM CDT. Hawley around 1230 AM CDT. Hamby around 1245 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Abilene, Impact, Hodges, Lake Fort Phantom Hill, Kirby Lake, Stith and Truby. This includes Interstate 20 between Mile Markers 268 and 292. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
